title: Situational Interest Design Strategies for Motivating Online Liberal Arts Education

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in job-related basic language skills and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Professionals in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) have a need to practically connect liberal arts education. Requires enhanced real-time interaction in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can connect and explain three situational language expressions to practical case examples in online discussions.
Learners can create a design plan applying creative writing techniques to solve job-related problems using liberal arts topics.
Learners can complete a portfolio reflecting personal meaning of liberal arts learning content based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
